page.shortlink: api client api a5 d date calendar extended formats namespace
page.description: Formats to use in extended calendar dates. Used by *[link:Date.toCalendar]*. See *[link:Date.toFormat]*.

property.name: time
property.description: The date format to use for the time part of a calendar date. The default is "h:0mam".

property.name: day
property.description: The date format to use for a calendar date that is within a week (or week from) the current date. This is combined with templates to get results like "last Friday". The default is "Weekday".

property.name: month
property.description: The date format to use for a calendar date that is within the same month as the current date. The default is "Weekday t\\he x".

property.name: year
property.description: The date format to use for a calendar date that is within the same year as the current date. The default is "Weekday t\\he x of Month".

property.name: longer
property.description: The date format to use for a calendar date that is not in the same year as the current date. The default is "Weekday t\\he x of Month yyyy".

page.note: Any properties in this namespace can be replaced in order to support other languages or formats.
